OpenAI is reportedly developing a groundbreaking AI device that is compact, screenless, and designed to serve as an “AI companion” seamlessly integrated into daily life. Dubbed a "third core device" alongside smartphones and laptops, this innovation follows OpenAI's acquisition of design-focused startup io, founded by former Apple designer Jony Ive, in a $6.5 billion equity deal. CEO Sam Altman suggests this new category of devices could add up to $1 trillion in market value, signaling significant business potential and disruption in consumer technology. 

For professionals and business leaders, this move highlights the strategic importance of merging AI capabilities with innovative hardware design to unlock new markets and enhance user experiences—offering lessons in vision-driven product development and competitive secrecy.
